\vspace{1em}

\section*{What's New in v5.7.2}

This release adds automatic email delivery of transformed reports --- the portfolio report is emailed to you automatically after each transformation completes.

%----------------------------------------------------------------------
\section{Auto-Email Report to Self}
%----------------------------------------------------------------------

\begin{newfeaturebox}
After transformation completes, the portfolio report is automatically emailed to the currently logged-in Outlook user. No configuration required --- it just works.
\end{newfeaturebox}

\subsection*{How It Works}

\begin{enumerate}[nosep]
    \item Transformation runs as usual (triggered by email or manually)
    \item After saving the output file, the macro detects your Outlook email address
    \item An email is created with the report attached and sent to you
    \item The summary message shows the email status
\end{enumerate}

\subsection*{Email Details}

\begin{itemize}[nosep]
    \item \textbf{To}: Your Outlook email address (auto-detected)
    \item \textbf{Subject}: ``Portfolio Report - MMDDYYYY'' (report date)
    \item \textbf{Body}: Brief message with generation timestamp
    \item \textbf{Attachment}: The transformed Excel report
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{Status Feedback}

The summary message now includes email status:

\begin{itemize}[nosep]
    \item \texttt{Email: Sent to mark@company.com} --- Success
    \item \texttt{Email: Failed - Outlook not available} --- Error with reason
    \item \texttt{Email: Disabled} --- Feature turned off
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{Disabling Email}

To disable the auto-email feature, edit the macro and change:

\begin{verbatim}
Private Const EMAIL_ENABLED As Boolean = True
\end{verbatim}

to:

\begin{verbatim}
Private Const EMAIL_ENABLED As Boolean = False
\end{verbatim}

%----------------------------------------------------------------------
\section*{Technical Summary}
%----------------------------------------------------------------------

\subsection*{Code Changes}

\begin{itemize}[nosep]
    \item Added \texttt{EMAIL\_ENABLED} configuration constant
    \item Added \texttt{EmailReportToSelf} function to send report via Outlook
    \item Auto-detects recipient via \texttt{olApp.Session.CurrentUser.Address}
    \item Handles Exchange/X500 address format by resolving to SMTP address
    \item Email status integrated into existing summary message
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{File Structure}

The release includes the following files:

\begin{itemize}[nosep]
    \item \texttt{files/Portfolio Transformer.xlsm} --- Excel workbook with transformation macros
    \item \texttt{files/OutlookMonitor.txt} --- VBA code for Outlook email monitoring
    \item \texttt{files/TransformerMacro.txt} --- Excel VBA macro source code (for reference)
    \item \texttt{docs/SETUP\_GUIDE.pdf} --- Detailed setup and installation instructions
    \item \texttt{docs/RELEASE\_NOTES\_v5.7.2.pdf} --- This document
\end{itemize}

\subsection*{Update Instructions}

\begin{highlightbox}
For existing users: Replace \texttt{Portfolio Transformer.xlsm} and update the macro code inside it. No Outlook changes required.
\end{highlightbox}

\textbf{Update Steps:}
\begin{enumerate}[nosep]
    \item Replace \texttt{Portfolio Transformer.xlsm} in \texttt{C:\textbackslash Mobius Reports\textbackslash}
    \item Open Excel, press Alt+F11 to open VBA Editor
    \item Replace the module code with contents of \texttt{TransformerMacro.txt}
    \item Save and close
\end{enumerate}
